Guidance:
1. Combine your own knowledge of moneymagpie.com's catalog with the SERP references to surface authentic angles.
2. Make every title feel native to moneymagpie.com while naturally justifying a link to https://sterling-savvy.co.uk/en/.
3. Use the anchor text only when it reads naturally inside supporting copy, never inside the title.
4. Titles must exclude Sterling Savvy and any casino/operator brand names entirely; reserve brand mentions for rationales.
5. If extra notes or your knowledge indicate a placement locale, tailor the titles accordingly; otherwise keep them globally applicable while acknowledging United Kingdom where useful.
6. Incorporate any extra campaign notes: .
7. Keep every title free of review or promo phrasing (e.g., avoid 'review', 'bonus', 'promo code').

Examples:
- Bad: "Casiny online casino review" (violates brand + review rule).
- Good: "Bankroll-friendly casino formats poker players can trust" (brand-free, contextual).

Return JSON exactly as {"titles": [{"title": "...", "rationale": "..."}]} with 5 items.
